data.oai_dc:dc: Zip file containing 5 R scripts for performing function-valued ancestral curve reconstruction, and all simulations conducted in the Syst Biol paper. Also included is a README file explaining use of each R script.

phylogenetic comparative method|ancestral state reconstruction|function-valued traits|infinite-dimensional traits|evolution of tolerance|reaction norms|phenotypic plasticity|dose-response curves|phylogenetic signal|PGLS
